show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
My guest is Barbara Fisher, PhD, a wise and dedicated clinical psychologist and psychotherapist who offers innovative... <!--more--> thoughts about how the brain and mind must recover together from emotional trauma and stress.
This hour became an active sharing of ideas between the two of us, focused on common themes across seemingly diverse events such as healing the trauma being experienced by people in Japan, healing the trauma of children who witness these catastrophes on TV, and healing the stresses of growing up within a family.
Our focus is on helping the individual through helping the family.
